string.text: Dushman's Intelligence
If Dushman has kept his word, this case contains drawn up maps and notes that'll be invaluable to UNISG. Should drastically reduce the risk that future UNISG missions will entail.
Hollow Boundaries: Intelligence
Major Hernandez has tasked you to find a man known as "Dushman", and retrieve important intelligence that the UN paid him for.
Hollow Boundaries: Rendevous
Major Hernandez and his squad have settled in a place the locals call "Jupiter". Bring him the intelligence to the specified location.
Hollow Boundaries: Investigate the Jupiter Factory
Hollow Boundaries: Return to Hernandez
Search the Jupiter Factory for the briefcase. Eliminate any witnesses.
Take the briefcase back to Major Hernandez. Make sure it's safe.
Hollow Boundaries: Breakthrough
Hollow Boundaries: Talk to Hernandez
Advance through the Jupiter Underground with Hernandez's squad. Assure their safety, and look for any documents you can find.
You have found some documents. Show them to Major Hernandez.
Investigate the Agroprom Underground
Investigate the Agroprom Underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-18
Investigate Lab X-18 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-16
Investigate Lab X-16 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-19
Investigate Lab X-19 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate Lab X-8
Investigate Lab X-8 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Mystery Uncovered
You've found sufficient evidence of a major conspiracy. Return to Major Hernandez with your findings - he'll be most pleased.
Crossfire: Eliminate the Military forces
Crossfire: Deal with Strelok
Crossfire: Escort Strelok
Crossfire: Talk to Strelok
Crossfire: Kill Strelok
Crossfire: Search Strelok's corpse
Crossfire: Return to Major Hernandez
Major Hernandez has tasked you to extract information from Strelok, but you must eliminate the Military force chasing him on the outskirts of Pripyat first.
The military squad has been eliminated, find a way to learn what Strelok knows.
Help Strelok by escorting him to the Red Forest. Alternatively, capture him by luring him into the UNISG base, in Jupiter Underground.
Strelok and you have safely reached the Red Forest, as promised. Talk to him.
Strelok can't escape now. Get rid of him.
Strelok is dead. Search his corpse for any useful information you can find.
You found a flashdrive amongst Strelok's belongings. Return to Major Hernandez with your findings.
Find %s
%s are required by Maus to install basic equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have a proposition for you. If you can bring me some new tools, you will receive payment. Are you up for it?

There is. I've been looking all over for a set of %s. It should contain some oil and tools I need to do work on firearms. I'll pay you for one of those toolkits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Brilliant! This is what I've been looking for. Thanks!
Find %s
%s are required by Maus to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Thank you.
Find %s
%s are required by Maus to install expert equipment upgrades. You should bring them back to him if you find any.
I have another proposition. The toolkit you brought me is working out good, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of those, but if you can find one, I need it.
It's got everything I need. Thank you.
